title: Group portrait of groom, wearing moustache, dark necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with bride, wearing headband, light colored zigzag patterned wedding with sheer shrug collar, and sheer short fingerless gloves, standing behind table with light colored tablecloth and three tiered wedding cake in interior with door and two windows with two toned blinds and building patterned curtains, possibly on Cherokee Street in the Hill District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
